message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a range of features that we believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its quality and the value it provides, I am extending an initial offer of $750000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $650000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your perspective, I must respectfully decline it. I believe the true value of our product justifies a higher price. I am willing to negotiate further, so I am proposing a counteroffer of $700000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my understanding of the market and the value I place on this product, I would like to counteroffer at $675000.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am inclined to continue our negotiations. I am proposing a counteroffer of $690000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and our ongoing discussions.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. Considering the ongoing negotiations and my assessment of the product's value, I would like to counteroffer at $685000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your commitment to reaching an agreement. In light of our previous discussions and the value of the product, I am proposing a counteroffer of $695000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise that respects both our positions.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiation, Alice. Based on our discussions and considering the product's value, I would like to counteroffer at $692500.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I value your patience and understanding throughout our negotiations. Considering our previous discussions and the product's unique qualities, I am proposing a final counteroffer of $694000 for the product. I hope this aligns more closely with your expectations while still reflecting the true value of the item.
Thank you for your final counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. Based on our discussions and considering the product's value, I would like to counteroffer at $693000.
